sections.text:
55-174.National Guard; fire department or district membership or service; effect on duty.

No member of the Nebraska National Guard shall be exempt or relieved from duty by membership or service in any fire department or district.

SourceLaws 1909, c. 90, § 65, p. 385;R.S.1913, § 3900;C.S.1922, § 3298;C.S.1929, § 55-102;R.S.1943, § 55-135;Laws 1969, c. 459, § 72, p. 1604.
